instruction: Please explain how the Chinese government has been encouraging investment in environmental protection projects and green bonds.
output: The Chinese government has been actively encouraging the allocation of funds towards environmental protection projects and green bonds. These policies have supported the increase in demand for green bond investments in both primary and secondary markets. According to data from Zhongchengxin Green Finance, 72% to 78% of green bonds have lower issuing costs than ordinary bonds that match the issuing date, term, bond industry, and credit rating. In 2021, secondary market trading volume increased by 40% compared to the previous year.
